backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature update request affecting the FooterSection component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all page sections using listing data.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Footer showing agent info, disclaimer, and a bottom bar with dynamic year and attribution.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Responsive gallery with lightbox modal supporting keyboard navigation.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner displaying property address, tagline, status badge, and hero image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Highlig: Highlights list showing property features with checkmark icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/KeyDeta: Property details section listing stats and an inquiry phone line.
frontend/src/data/listing.ts: Central listing data model and exported sold-house dataset.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module included as a placeholder since no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, including custom colors, radius, and accessibility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing current features, issues, and configuration for build planning.
